title: how to change the install directory on PBE client?
body: I watched so many videos that dont work,my C disk is left with 8 GB and the PBE client is like another League of Legends. I want to download the PBE cliend on F where i have 71GB free please help with my problem.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: When you're downloading the PBE client, you are simply downloading a folder with all of the files already there. In order to get it to download onto your F drive, you'll need to go into your browser settings and have your downloads go directly to the drive you'd like it to be installed on.
